get.summary: Get a faction's hall of fame rankings.
get.description: If the id is not provided it will return details of your own faction.

get.summary: Get a list of faction's members
get.description: The 'revive_setting' value will be populated (not Unknown) if you're requesting data for your faction and have faction permissions (with custom, limited or full access keys), otherwise it will be set as 'Unknown'. If the id is not provided it will return details of your own faction.

parameters.name: striptags
parameters.description: Determines if the 'status.details' field includes HTML or not ('Hospitalized by user' vs 'Hospitalized by user'

get.description: The 'is_enlisted' value will be populated if you're requesting data for your faction and have faction permissions (with custom, limited or full access keys), otherwise it will be set as null. If the id is not provided it will return details of your own faction.

get.summary: Get a faction's wars & pacts details

get.description: It is possible to pass up to 10 categories at the time (comma separated). Categories 'attack', 'depositFunds' and 'giveFunds' are only available with 'Custom', 'Limited' or 'Full' access keys.

get.summary: Get a list of publicly available forum categories
get.description: It is possible to get threads from returned public categories.
Returns a list of threads for the chosen forum category (or categories).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorted by the greatest of first_post_time and last_post_time timestamps

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Returns threads created before this timestamp

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Returns threads created after this timestamp

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The forum ID or a list of forum IDs

get.description: Return the details of a thread including topic content and poll (if any).
Returns 20 posts per page for the specific thread.

parameters.name: cat
parameters.description: Determines if the 'content' field returns raw HTML or plain text

get.description: It is possible to get specific weapon bonuses by using the 'cat' parameter (will be replaced with 'bonus' parameter in the near future.
Returns a list of races, ordered by race start timestamp.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Timestamp until when started races are returned (schedule.start)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Timestamp after when started races are returned (scheduled.start)

get.description: Returns a list of 10 best lap records for the chosen track and car class. Results are cached globally 1 hour.
Returns the details of a race.

get.summary: Get cars and their racing stats
get.description: Returns the stat details about racing cars.
Returns the details about racing tracks.
Returns the details about all possible car upgrades.
Return the details about possible actions for a specific crime.
Return the details about released crimes.
Get the details about competitions & events in the running year.

get.summary: Get player hall of fame positions for a specific category
Get faction hall of fame positions for a specific category

get.description: Default behavior is to return all log ids, but you can also get only specific log types by passing a category id.
Return the details and statistics about a user's specific crime.
Returns a list of user races, ordered by race start timestamp.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Timestamp until when started races are returned (schedule.start)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Timestamp after when started races are returned (scheduled.start)

get.description: Returns a list of all user enlisted cars.

get.summary: Get posts for a specific player
get.description: Returns 20 posts per page for a specific player.

parameters.name: cat
parameters.description: Determines if the 'content' field returns raw HTML or plain text

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Returns posts created before this timestamp

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Returns posts created after this timestamp

get.summary: Get threads for a specific player
get.description: Returns 100 threads per page for a specific player. When requesting data for the key owner, a field 'new_posts' is also available, indicating the amount of unread posts. Minimum API key is required for that.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorted by the greatest of first_post_time and last_post_time timestamps

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Returns threads created before this timestamp

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Returns threads created after this timestamp

get.summary: Get updates on threads you subscribed to
get.description: This selection returns data visible in 'Subscribed Threads' section on forum page. Threads are sorted in the same way as on site.

get.summary: Get updates on your threads and posts
get.description: This selection returns data visible in 'Feed' section on forum page. Feed is sorted by timestamp descending. Only a maximum of 100 rows are returned.

get.summary: Get updates on your friends' activity
get.description: This selection returns data visible in 'Friends' section on forum page. Feed is sorted by timestamp descending. Only a maximum of 100 rows are returned.

get.summary: Get a player's hall of fame rankings
get.description: When requesting selection for yourself with Limited key (or higher), battle_stats selection will be populated.

get.summary: Get your competition's event start time
get.description: Only available to yourself.

get.summary: Get bounties placed on a user

get.description: Only available to yourself.

next.description: Auto-generated link to get the next set of records.

prev.description: Auto-generated link to get the prev set of records.

ForumFeedTypeEnum.description:
This represents the type of the activity. Values range from 1 to 8 where:
 *                    1 = 'X posted on a thread',
 *                    2 = 'X created a thread',
 *                    3 = 'X liked your thread',
 *                    4 = 'X disliked your thread',
 *                    5 = 'X liked your post',
 *                    6 = 'X disliked your post',
 *                    7 = 'X quoted your post'.

UserLastAction.description: Details about a user's last action.

is_enlisted.description: Indicates if the faction is enlisted for ranked wars. Available only with faction AA permissions for your own faction.

until.description: The duration until when is the non-aggression pact valid.

target.description: The score target of the war.

factions.description: The factions involved in the ranked war.
The factions involved in the raid war.

target.description: The score target of the war.

factions.description: The factions involved in the territory war.

views.description: Total number of times players have opened this thread.

is_legacy.description: Indicates whether post was made using the old formatting engine which doesn't use HTML.

content.description: depending on the input 'cat' parameter, this will either return raw value (with HTML) or plain text. Legacy posts are returned as is, they can't be stripped of tags.

new_posts.description: Available only when requesting data for yourself (no id or your id) with at least 'Minimal' access type key.

value.description: Value representing the chosen category. Traveltime is shown in seconds. If the chosen category is 'rank', the value is of type string. If the chosen category is 'racingskill', the value is of type float. Otherwise it is an integer.

chain.description: Maximum chain achieved by the faction. Null if chosen category is 'rank' or 'respect'.

chain_duration.description: The duration of the chain. Null if chosen category is 'rank' or 'respect'.

rank.description: The full rank title & division of the faction.

lister_id.description: If the bounty is anonymous this field is null.

lister_name.description: If the bounty is anonymous this field is null.

achieved_uniques.description: This field is replaced by 'uniques' field which provides more information about achieved uniques. This field will be removed on 1st of November.

miscellaneous.description: Miscellaneous stats for specific crime. Results differ based on the cat id.

battle_stats.description: This field is null when requesting data for other players.

start_time.description: Event start time displayed in TCT.

ApiTo.name: to
ApiTo.description: Timestamp that sets the upper limit for the data returned. Data returned will be up to and including this time

ApiFrom.name: from
ApiFrom.description: Timestamp that sets the lower limit for the data returned. Data returned will be after this time

ApiStripTagsTrue.name: striptags
ApiStripTagsTrue.description: Determines if fields include HTML or not ('Hospitalized by user' vs 'Hospitalized by user'

ApiStripTagsFalse.name: striptags
ApiStripTagsFalse.description: Determines if fields include HTML or not ('Hospitalized by user' vs 'Hospitalized by user'
